name: From the Looking Glass
description:
- [WASD] (or arrow keys) to move. [R] to reset

- The GOAL of the game is to collect as many shards as possible before you die!

- GET CLOSE TO BULLETS to absorb energy from them- this will both RESTORE HEALTH and CHARGE YOUR ENERGY METER (at the top of the screen), which is required to find more shards!

- Your HEALTH BAR is at the bottom of the screen. Keep in mind that you take less damage from small bullets.

- Your CURRENT AND HIGH SCORE are on the right side of the screen. To complete the mirror, you must collect 50 shards (although the game is endless)
